content.raw:
We are having the following message from code-check unsolve:

    [/home/docker/ignition/ign-rendering-ogre2/include/ignition/rendering/base/BaseStorage.hh:292]: (style) Class 'BaseStoreWrapper' has a constructor with 1 argument that is not explicit.

That message is reported here not recommending using implicit declarations:  
[https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo\_design/issues/2/cppcheck-errors-constructor-with-1](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_design/issues/2/cppcheck-errors-constructor-with-1)  
  
But we can leave it for now. Besides that and Nate’s comment, everything looks ok

[/home/docker/ignition/ign-rendering-ogre2/include/ignition/rendering/base/BaseStorage.hh:292]: (style) Class 'BaseStoreWrapper' has a constructor with 1 argument that is not explicit.

That message is reported here not recommending using implicit declarations:

But we can leave it for now. Besides that and Nate’s comment, everything looks ok
